survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with In-Office Mental Health Resources Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the mental health resources provided in the office environment, including counseling services, wellness programs, and stress management tools.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources available in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
